content: HDG flat washer ISO 7089 Hot-dip galvanized (HDG) flat washer corresponding to ISO 7089 ### Categories: Home > Products > Modular support systems > Standard fixings for support systems- - - ### FEATURES:Features Available in various diameters Versatile – flat washers can help to prevent bolts loosening due to vibration or pulling through the base material, and can also be used as spacers Moderate corrosion resistance – this flat washer is hot-dip galvanized Applications Spreading the applied load – flat washers help to prevent damage to the bearing surface Recommended for use in moderately corrosive outdoor and indoor environments ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material composition: Steel - DIN EN ISO 7089 Surface finish: Outdoor Coated - HDG Load range: Light duty Technical Data | Material composition | Steel - DIN EN ISO 7089 | Surface finish | Outdoor Coated - HDG | Load range | Light duty ### ITEMS- 2184531 - Flat washer A 13/24-F for M12 bolts - Package Size 100 pc Package Contents: - 1x 12 Washer hot dip galv - 2184532 - Flat washer 16 17x30x3-F ISO 7089 200 HV - Package Size 50 pc Package Contents: - 1x 16 Washer hot dip galv
tag_description: Hot-dip galvanized (HDG) flat washer corresponding to ISO 7089
